How to get the Consol screen:
1.Make a shurtcut to hl.exe or whatever game.
2.Right click the icon and press Properties.
3.You will se a line called "Target"/"Mål",here is
the actual adress of the file.
It should look something like this: "F:\Program Files\HalfLife\hl.exe"

At the end of this adress add the following command: -console

This makes the Console Avalible when u press "|" /tilde butten/the buttom over tab.

So my game adress look's like this:
"F:\Program Files\HalfLife\hl.exe" -console
